value.name: Graphic Body Cam Video Shows Deadly Fresno Police Shooting
value.description: (WARNING: GRAPHIC VIDEO) Police released a gruesome body camera footage of a 19-year-old Dylan Noble being fatally shot by Fresno Police officers last month. (7/14/16)
